text: Gennes-Longuefuye is a commune of 1,327 people (2017). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Gennes-sur-Glaize (the seat) and Longuefuye.Arrêté préfectoral 14 November 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Mayenne
title: Gennes-Longuefuye
